articles.title: CDC study estimates over 80% of Americans are now protected from COVID-19 - Daily Mail
articles.description: About 83% of the U.S. population ages 16 and up has some degree of protection against COVID-19 from vaccination or past infection, the CDC estimates based on a survey of antibody levels.

articles.title: Japan princess to wed, reject payout after controversy: Reports - New Straits Times Online
articles.description: TOKYO: The course of true love never did run smooth, but after public controversy and a wedding delay, Japan's Princess Mako is reportedly set to tie the knot and move to America.
